title: Diamond ADC(pref) or mid(pref ADC) LF serious team
body:
Been practicing my ADC on my smurf and got it up to diamond V! 70-80% winrates on my adcs on that acc add me for the name etc. 

Really keen for a team :) ~ I main Draven{{champion:119}}

replies.body:
Hay there, looking for a ADC to sub for my ranked team, although my ranking isn't the highest, my team just recently reached Gold and are looking to improve! If you're interested send me a friends request! 

IGN: DV Silent Resent

Currently we do not have a strict time for practice, but we seem to play ranked 5's every night from 9PM onwards AWST
